name: Hearts In Lead
description:
You have been sent to the Middle East with a mission. You've been ambushed, your pals were killed. You have to grab the rifle and finish the job yourself. It turns out that your enemies were something bigger than just a band of terrorists...

+OVER 10 LEVELS AND 6 BOSSES

+BUY EQUIPMENT AND UPGRADE YOUR WEAPON

+THE STORY TOLD IN COMICS AND DIALOGUES

+COLLECT ACHIEVEMENTS

+CONTENT TO BE UNLOCKED AFTER FINISHING THE GAME

+INNOVATIVE GAMEPLAY

any feedback about the game send to studioorangefeedback@gmail.com

Game created by Pryzmate & StudioOrange
